languages.text: "Видеть скверну? Какая нелепая патетика. Но что до методов..." {n}Маражай издает гадкий смешок, оглядывая Чорду.{/n} "Это место пропитано болью словно пыточные моего родного шпиля. Изысканной, искусной болью, порожденной со знанием дела. Впечатляюще! Я поражен изобретательностью этой мон-кай... и тем, насколько изощренно она ублажает свою страсть". {n}Взгляд ксеноса опускается на человека с обнаженным мозгом.{/n}

"Perceiving corruption? What lofty yet paltry hysterics. Your methods, however..." {n}Marazhai looks Incendia over and lets out a wanton laugh.{/n} "This place is soaked with pain, much like the torture chambers of my old spire. It takes a skilled hand to elicit such refined, artful anguish. Impressive! I am amazed by this mon-keigh's ingenuity... and her intricate means of indulging her passion." {n}His gaze shifts to the bare-brained man.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Видеть скверну? Какая нелепая патетика. Но что до методов..." {n}Маражай издает гадкий смешок, оглядывая Чорду.{/n} "Это место пропитано болью словно пыточные моего родного шпиля. Изысканной, искусной болью, порожденной со знанием дела. Впечатляюще! Я поражен изобретательностью этой мон-кай... и тем, насколько изощренно она ублажает свою страсть". {n}Взгляд ксеноса опускается на человека с обнаженным мозгом.{/n}

It takes a skilled hand to elicit such refined, artful anguish. Impressive! I am amazed by this mon-keigh's ingenuity... and her intricate means of indulging her passion." {n}His gaze shifts to the bare-brained man.{/n}

languages.text: “感知腐化？多么崇高、又多么微不足道的疯言疯语啊。不过，你的手段嘛……”{n}玛拉斋打量着因森蒂娅，放肆地大笑起来。{/n}“这个地方充满了痛苦，就像我的尖塔上曾经的酷刑室一样。若要带来如此精致、如此充满艺术感痛苦，需要一双相当灵巧的手。这实在是太了不起了！这只猴子的聪明才智……以及她放纵激情的繁复手段，让我惊异不已。”{n}他将目光转向了那个被切开头颅的男人。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perceiving corruption? What lofty yet paltry hysterics. Your methods, however..." {n}Marazhai looks Incendia over and lets out a wanton laugh.{/n} "This place is soaked with pain, much like the torture chambers of my old spire. It takes a skilled hand to elicit such refined, artful anguish. Impressive! I am amazed by this mon-keigh's ingenuity... and her intricate means of indulging her passion." {n}His gaze shifts to the bare-brained man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “感知腐化？多么崇高、又多么微不足道的疯岩疯语啊。不过，你的手段嘛……”{n}玛拉斋打量着因森蒂娅，放肆地大笑起来。{/n}“这个地方充满了痛苦，就像我的尖塔上曾经的酷刑室一样。若要带来如此精致、如此充满艺术感痛苦，需要一双相当灵巧的手。这实在是太了不起了！这只猴子的聪明才智……以及她放纵激情的繁复手段，让我惊异不已。”{n}他将目光转向了那个被切开头颅的男人。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「腐敗を見抜く？気高いと同時に、なんとも下劣なヒステリーだ。だが、お前のやり口は…」{n}マラズハイはインセンディアを見ると、ふざけるように笑ってみせる。{/n}「この地は苦痛に浸されている。古い尖塔の拷問部屋を見ているかの様だ。これほどの苦悩を生み出すには、かなりの熟練の技が必要だろう。素晴らしい！このモン＝ケイの創造力には驚かされる」{n}彼の視線は、脳を曝け出している男に止まった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perceiving corruption? What lofty yet paltry hysterics. Your methods, however..." {n}Marazhai looks Incendia over and lets out a wanton laugh.{/n} "This place is soaked with pain, much like the torture chambers of my old spire. It takes a skilled hand to elicit such refined, artful anguish. Impressive! I am amazed by this mon-keigh's ingenuity... and her intricate means of indulging her passion." {n}His gaze shifts to the bare-brained man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「腐敗を見抜く？気高いと同時に、なんとも下劣なヒステリーだ。だが、お前のやり口は…」{n}マラズハイはインセンディアを見ると、ふざけるように笑ってみせる。{/n}「この地は苦痛に浸されている。古い尖塔の拷問部屋を見ているかの様だ。これほどの苦悩を生み出すには、かなりの熟練の技が必要だろう。素晴らしい！このモン＝ケイの創造力には驚かされる」{n}彼の視線は、脳を曝け出している男に止まった。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Percibir la corrupción? Qué histeria tan idealista a la par que insignificante. Sus métodos sin embargo...». {n}Marazhai mira a Incendia y suelta una risa lasciva.{/n} «Este lugar está empapado de dolor, como las cámaras de tortura de mi antigua torre. Se necesita una mano experta para provocar un sufrimiento tan refinado. ¡Impresionante! Me asombra el ingenio de esta mon-keigh... y sus métodos tan complejos de satisfacer su pasión». {n}Su mirada se desplaza hacia el hombre con el cerebro desnudo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perceiving corruption? What lofty yet paltry hysterics. Your methods, however..." {n}Marazhai looks Incendia over and lets out a wanton laugh.{/n} "This place is soaked with pain, much like the torture chambers of my old spire. It takes a skilled hand to elicit such refined, artful anguish. Impressive! I am amazed by this mon-keigh's ingenuity... and her intricate means of indulging her passion." {n}His gaze shifts to the bare-brained man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Percibir la corrupción? Qué histeria tan idealista a la par que insignificante. Sus métodos sin embargo...». {n}Marazhai mira a Incendia y suelta una risa lasciva.{/n} «Este lugar está empapado de dolor, como las cámaras de tortura de mi antigua torre. Se necesita una mano experta para provocar un sufrimiento tan refinado. ¡Impresionante! Me asombra el ingenio de esta mon-keigh... y sus métodos tan complejos de satisfacer su pasión». {n}Su mirada se desplaza hacia el hombre con el cerebro desnudo.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Verderbnis wahrnehmen? Welch erhabene und doch armselige Hysterie. Eure Methoden jedoch ..." {n}Marazhai mustert Incendia und stößt ein liederliches Lachen aus.{/n} "Hier ist alles durchtränkt von Schmerzen, ganz wie in den Folterkammern meines alten Turms. Es ist eine fähige Hand nötig, um solch edle, künstlerische Pein hervorzukitzeln. Beeindruckend! Ich bin erstaunt über den Einfallsreichtum dieses Chem-Pan-Sey ... Und über ihre ausgeklügelten Wege, ihrer Leidenschaft nachzugehen." {n}Sein Blick wandert zu dem Mann mit dem nackten Gehirn.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perceiving corruption? What lofty yet paltry hysterics. Your methods, however..." {n}Marazhai looks Incendia over and lets out a wanton laugh.{/n} "This place is soaked with pain, much like the torture chambers of my old spire. It takes a skilled hand to elicit such refined, artful anguish. Impressive! I am amazed by this mon-keigh's ingenuity... and her intricate means of indulging her passion." {n}His gaze shifts to the bare-brained man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Verderbnis wahrnehmen? Welch erhabene und doch armselige Hysterie. Eure Methoden jedoch ..." {n}Marazhai mustert Incendia und stößt ein liederliches Lachen aus.{/n} "Hier ist alles durchtränkt von Schmerzen, ganz wie in den Folterkammern meines alten Turms. Es ist eine fähige Hand nötig, um solch edle, künstlerische Pein hervorzukitzeln. Beeindruckend! Ich bin erstaunt über den Einfallsreichtum dieses Chem-Pan-Sey ... Und über ihre ausgeklügelten Wege, ihrer Leidenschaft nachzugehen." {n}Sein Blick wandert zu dem Mann mit dem nackten Gehirn.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Percevoir la corruption ? Des propos aussi pédants que ridicules. Vos méthodes, en revanche... » {n}Marazhai jauge Incendia du regard et éclate de rire.{/n} « Cet endroit est pétri de douleur, à l'instar des salles de torture de ma vieille tour. Il faut des mains expertes pour provoquer une angoisse aussi raffinée et artistique. Très impressionnant ! L'ingéniosité de cette mon-keigh me fascine... tout autant que les moyens qu'elle emploie pour s'adonner à sa passion, » {n}ajoute-t-il en posant les yeux sur l'homme au cerveau à nu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perceiving corruption? What lofty yet paltry hysterics. Your methods, however..." {n}Marazhai looks Incendia over and lets out a wanton laugh.{/n} "This place is soaked with pain, much like the torture chambers of my old spire. It takes a skilled hand to elicit such refined, artful anguish. Impressive! I am amazed by this mon-keigh's ingenuity... and her intricate means of indulging her passion." {n}His gaze shifts to the bare-brained man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Percevoir la corruption ? Des propos aussi pédants que ridicules. Vos méthodes, en revanche... » {n}Marazhai jauge Incendia du regard et éclate de rire.{/n} « Cet endroit est pétri de douleur, à l'instar des salles de torture de ma vieille tour. Il faut des mains expertes pour provoquer une angoisse aussi raffinée et artistique. Très impressionnant ! L'ingéniosité de cette mon-keigh me fascine... tout autant que les moyens qu'elle emploie pour s'adonner à sa passion, » {n}ajoute-t-il en posant les yeux sur l'homme au cerveau à nu.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Yozlaşmayı algılamak mı? Hem çok ulvi hem de saçma sapan bir sanrı. Gelgelelim metotların..." {n}Marazhai, İncendia'yı tepeden tırnağa süzüp lakayıt bir kahkaha koparıyor.{/n} "Bu yer acıyla yıkanmış. Tıpkı eski kulemin işkence odaları gibi. Böylesine rafine, sanatsal bir ızdırap ortaya çıkarmak için kabiliyetli bir el gerekir. Etkileyici! Bu mon-keigh'in maharetine ve tutkusunu tatmin etmek için kullandığı detaylı yöntemlere hayran kaldım." {n}Bakışları, beyni açılmış adama kayıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perceiving corruption? What lofty yet paltry hysterics. Your methods, however..." {n}Marazhai looks Incendia over and lets out a wanton laugh.{/n} "This place is soaked with pain, much like the torture chambers of my old spire. It takes a skilled hand to elicit such refined, artful anguish. Impressive! I am amazed by this mon-keigh's ingenuity... and her intricate means of indulging her passion." {n}His gaze shifts to the bare-brained man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yozlaşmayı algılamak mı? Ne kadar da ulvi ancak aynı zamanda saçma sapan sanrılar. Metotların ama..." {n}Marazhai, İncendia'yı tepeden tırnağa süzüyor ve lakayıt bir kahkaha koparıyor.{/n} "Bu yer acıyla yıkanmış. Tıpkı eski kulemin işkence odaları gibi. Böylesine rafine, sanatsal bir ızdırap ortaya çıkarmak için kabiliyetli bir ele sahip olmak gerekir. Etkileyici! Bu mon-keigh'in maharetine hayran kaldım. Tutkusunu tatmin etmek için kullandığı detaylı yöntemlere de." {n}Bakışları, beyni açılmış adama kayıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
